Class MovingMonster

  • java.lang.Object
    • labyrinth.GameObject
      • labyrinth.Monster
        • labyrinth.MovingMonster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MovingMonster
extends Monster
implements Movable
    Class that represents a monster that can move inside of labyrinth.
